item.title: Obsidian
item.description: What is obsidian? [!NOTE] Philosophy Obsidian lets you create the note first and then lets you organise however you want - [[build knowledge from bottom to top]]

item.title: Obsidian Dataview
item.description: Obsidian Dataview References Obsidian Database view

item.title: Obsidian Diagrams
item.description: Obsidian Diagrams Obsidian uses under the hood a library called Mermaid - which is an 1 2 3 4 5 sequenceDiagram Alice->>+John: Hello John, how are you?

item.title: Obsidian for book summary
item.description: Obsidian for book summary We should start first with: Why to take notes and how to get the most ![[How to get the most of a book]]

item.title: Productivity with Obsidian
item.description: Productivity with Obsidian Why obsidian? Obsidian is a great tool to use as it lets you increase your knowledge incrementally with a minimum set-up and implementing a basic [[Zettelkasten Methodology]] we can create a great note-taking system
